Instruction: In a mixing bowl, combine red raspberries, diced red onion, chopped cilantro, diced jalapeno pepper, lime juice, and salt.
Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
Taste the raspberry salsa and adjust the seasoning as needed.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate the salsa for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve the raspberry salsa as a flavorful side dish or topping for grilled meats or seafood.
